jp_name: 味見スプーン Ajimi Supūn
description: Using the gadget, the user can taste samples of several foods from the magazines, books or pictures. It is very convenient since the user does not have to go very far or spend money just to taste the food. However, the spoon can only be used one time per picture, so if the user wants to taste it again, he/she will need another spoon.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
In the 1979 adaptation of the anime, the Scheduler Clock has an orange exterior with black spade-like hands used to prick the user if not abiding to the schedule set.
In the 2006 adaptation, the clock has a red exterior with a yellow slot and blue hands.
The Scheduler Clock is used to plan events of any kind. Once a schedule paper/timetable is inserted in the gadget, it keeps the time that the user does a particular event. However, it is hasty; it forces the user to do the event it planned with the gadget even in bad weather (e.g. in the rain), unsuitable conditions, or even if the task itself is already done. Moreover, the gadget treats the person who inserts the schedule paper/timetable in as the user, so the non-user has to be careful to not putting in the paper under any circumstance.
The following is Doraemon's schedule that was intended for Nobita:

jp_name: 見たままスコープ "Mitama masukōpu"
description: This gadget can help you remember events or footsteps you took by attaching this object to your head. All the scene you saw with your eyes are dug up from the depths of your brain's memories and will be projected on a screen. Then set the time for the event and you will see again what events you have done that day projected on the screen.

jp_name: かげきりばさみ
description:
The Shadow Cutting Scissors can cut a shadow of a person if the shadow's figure is completely visible. Thus, the person whom shadow is about to be cut should stand on a place with good lighting. After the shadow is detached from the person, it will become somewhat 3-dimensional, and animated. The person's shadow is unable to speak, yet docile and obedient in the first 30 minutes. But if the shadow is still around exceeds 30 minutes, it will become smarter, and its blackness will start transforming it into its person. The person is instead, starts to become darker, and more 'shadow-like'. Despite it starting to become more like their person, they are still light-weight, have malleable bodies and incredible naughtiness. The person and the shadow will be switched each other in two hours. The shadow should be immediately bind to the person back using the Shadow Binding Glue. Because a shadow is virtually not physical, one should catch them with the Shadow Capturing Mochi". A person's shadow cut by the Shadow Cutting Scissors has similar personalities with their person. For example, Shadow Nobita is scared of Tamako Nobi's shadow.
Anime
Manga

jp_name: ショックガン Shokku Gan
description:
It is the initial starting weapon in Doraemon for the Famicom.
It only stuns an opponent, not killing them.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: 六面カメラ Rokumen Kamera
description: Have a copy of a picture with an object and then picture it with the gadget. After that you can have a 3D view of the object; on back, front, left, right or on top.
appears_in: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
The New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: ネムケスイトール "Nemukesuitōru"
description:
This pistol can relieve your sleepiness by pumping the body of the gun. Just aim at the person you are aiming at, then a sleep bubble will come out of your nose and be absorbed by this weapon, so you will feel less sleepy.
The drowsiness absorbed earlier can be shot at other people. Just fire at the intended target and they will immediately fall asleep for a few moments.

jp_name: スぺルガス
description: Spray it on someone and the one sprayed on will be able to slide on anything.
appears_in: Getting Fired Up! Dorami's Crash Course in Figure Skating

jp_name: スモールライト Sumōru Raito
description:
The Small Light shines a light beam that can reduce the size and mass of anything or anybody it touches. 
It is a green flashlight with a yellow-orange bottom. It has a blue top with four spheres on it, and a glass hemisphere that emits the light beam. It also has two buttons, the red one shrinks the target, while the yellow one serves a reverse setting as it enlarges the target back to normal size.
appears_in: A Visitor from the Country of the Future/U.S. English dub
Even Though It's Inside the Stomach Acid
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~
Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Winged Angels~

jp_name: ふにゃふニャー "Fu nya fu nyā"
description: Any object touched by this cat's hands will become very soft, squishy, and tender, even as hard as iron and stone can be changed by this gadget, it's very nice if you touch it and be on top of it. If you want to return back to normal, just touch it again with this cat's hand.

jp_name: 空間接着剤 Kūkan Setchaku-zai
description: The gadget can glue any object or living thing in air or space.
appears_in: Nobita and the Island of Miracles ~Animal Adventure~

jp_name: 空間ひんまげテープ Kūkan Hinmage Tēpu
description:
The tape is used to bend the reality of dimension and space. Doraemon used on Nobisuke Nobi's employer to keep him out and agitate him to make him leave. The tape is used onto the front door's knob by sticking it into a loop which has be turned once. The tape causes the door to become a warping space that infinite cause the person who went through from the outside to came out outside again.
Simply put, it is used to create an entry that becomes an 'exit' and vice versa.

jp_name: 妖怪クリームセット Yōkai Kurīmu Settoおおかみ男クリーム  Ōkami Otoko Kurīmuドラキュラクリーム Dorakyura Kurīmu雪女クリーム Yuki-onna Kurīmuもどしクリーム Modoshi Kurīmu
description:
This set of gadgets consists of Werewolf Cream, Dracula Cream, Snow Woman Cream, and the Restoring Cream.


Main article: Werewolf Cream
The Werewolf Cream is cream that can make a person become a werewolf.


Main article: Dracula Cream
The Dracula Cream is cream can make a person become Dracula.


Main article: Snow Woman Cream
The Snow Woman Cream is cream can make a person become a snow woman ghost(Yuki-onna).


Main article: Restoring Cream
The Back-to-Normal Cream or Restoring Cream is cream used to return to normal.

jp_name: スパイセット
description: The whole Spy Set looks like a head of a robot with one eye and a left ear. The 'head' has an antenna, which receives transmissions from the eye and ear. Both eye and ear are detachable, and can levitate around. They are small enough to slip into a person's house. The 'mouth of the head' can be opened and functions as the monitor.

jp_name: General InformationFunctionsDetails
description:
In the movie, it appears with a regular brown color around and a dark-brown toe cap on it. In the 2005 anime episode, it has a lighter complexion with orange all around, and a light yellow at the toe cap. The anime version also has small tags at the back of each shoe.
The size of the shoe in the anime was huge, most likely to fit into Doraemon's feet, as he was the only user of this gadget in it.
The wearer of this shoe can jump into any story book and experience its incidents in a realistic manner. The wearer is immune to the elements of the story book, i.e., they cannot drown in water or burn in fire. If taken a look at the pages from outside, the wearer can be seen in the illustrations of the book. This property helped Nobita and Doraemon in the movie, to find out which book Shizuka got stuck in.

jp_name: ストレートホール Sutorēto Hōru
description: The gadget's shape is like the Pass Loop but the function is the same as the Anywhere Door.

jp_name: 糸なし糸電話 Ito Nashi Ito Denwa
description: It can be used to communicate with or hear another person, no matter how far he/she is.
appears_in: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Angel Wings~
The String Phone Without a String
The Debut of a New Song! Gian's The Greatest!
Pizza Dumplings Shining in the Night Sky

jp_name: 入れかえロープ
description: if there are two people holds one of the ends of this rope at the same time, their spirits will stay the same, only the bodies will be swapped. However in Stand by Me 2, this gadget has a fatal design flaw, which is that if a person does not return to their original body within 1 hour their memories will be wiped out, along with them passing out. The Substitution Rope was many times used by Doraemon, Nobita and other Tama Friends:

jp_name: 代用シール Daiyō Shīru
description: The stickers allow their user to substitute an item for another by writing that object's name on the sticker, and applying the sticker to an item that they want to "substitute". The item's use is not limited to just objects, and can also be used on buildings, or even people. If the sticker falls off the effect will end.

jp_name: スーパー手袋
description:
Super Gloves allow the user to perform various physical activities with increased strength, similar to Superman. The strength is described "as strong as Hercules".
There is a 1-versus-rivals minigame that hosts this gadget. This mini-game is quite unusual since the soloist has to flee as his opponents hurl rocks at him with the gloves. If a rock touches his body as it falls, the soloist is defeated and the team players win. However, if he manages to escape, the soloist wins.
appears_in: A Girl Like White Lily/2005 Anime
Doraemon: Nobita and the Haunts of Evil
Doraemon: Nobita and the New Steel Troops ~Winged Angels~
Doraemon: New Nobita's Great Demon ~Peko and the Exploration Party of 5~

jp_name: スーパーグルメスパイス
description: When this item is applied to a target, it becomes irresistibly delicious to everyone else, prompting their desire to consume it.

jp_name: スーパー移(い)動(どう)風(ぶ)呂(ろ)1010 Sūpā idō furo sentō
description: Despite its name, the Super Mobile Bath 1010 doesn't offer anything on its own, and must be attached to a bathtub for warp. By pressing the red button, it will display the world map so that the user can choose a country that leads to a place with a beautiful scenery. By pressing the blue button, it returns the user into his/her original place. By pressing the yellow button, it will select a random place and scenery that cannot be stopped unless the user presses the yellow button and the blue button at the same time.
